metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39945 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Improper access control in the GitLab CE/EE API affecting all versions starting from 9.4 before 14.3.6, all versions starting from 14.4 before 14.4.4, all versions starting from 14.5 before 14.5.2, allows an author of a Merge Request to approve the Merge Request even after having their project access revoked

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
